title: Detroit cracks down on "paintball war"
text:
Detroit cracks down on 'paintball war' 1:52pm EDT - 01:17
Detroit police called for an end to a citywide paintball war they say has led to six arrests in a supposed campaign against gun violence that has spread to other U.S. cities. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
